statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 1 , 3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 4 , 12 \, x^{3} + 13 \, x^{2} - 15 \, x - 23 , -2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + x + 5 , -7 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x + 14\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
